attributes.action: To hold the prime minister, mps and Lords accountable for crimes committed.
attributes.additional_details: As peers of our country, the government are supposed to lead by example. How are we the public going to trust criminals who break the law and get away with it day in and day out. We want any person in a position of power who has broken the law or election promises to be tried in a court of law and when convicted excluded from ever taking part in government. We want an independent body investing not one run by the same people who have been committing the crimes.
attributes.background: We want any past, present or future prime minister, MP, Lord and or any other person within the democratic process, to be held accountable for crimes they commit. This is too include: election promise fraud, reckless endangerment, cronyism, and all crimes under UK law.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This would be a matter for the police, the CPS and the courts.
